entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 p.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -10.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 5:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SE 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
